name: Bunker (itch) (escapadegames)
description:
Oh no! An asteroid is about to hit the Earth! The only way to survive is to make your way deeper and deeper to an underground bunker before time runs out and you perish with the rest of humanity!

Along the way however, there are security checks to ensure that you are eligible to enter the bunker and survive the apocalypse. If you are unable to pass them, then I'm sorry, guess you'll die.

This was made for the Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam.

Credits to www.zapsplat.com for sound effects.
